title: "Build TensorFlow Lite for Android"
excerpt: "This document describes how to build TensorFlow Lite Android library on your own. Normally, you do not need to locally build TensorFlow Lite Android library. If you just want to use it, the easiest way is using the TensorFlow Lite AAR hosted at MavenCentral."
